node.statement: For n >= 5 and Zariski-generic A^(1),...,A^(n) in R^{3x4}, there exists a polynomial map F: R^{81n^4} -> R^N (independent of the A^(i), with coordinate degrees independent of n) such that F(lambda_{abcd} Q^{abcd}) = 0 iff lambda_{abcd} = u_a v_b w_c x_d for some u,v,w,x in (R*)^n (for all non-identical a,b,c,d), where Q^{abcd}_{ijkl} = det[A^(a)(i,:); A^(b)(j,:); A^(c)(k,:); A^(d)(l,:)].
